mapper.select: SELECT CEO_ID ceoId, CEO_NAME ceoName, COM_NUM comNum, COM_ID comId, COM_NAME comName, COM_ADDRESS comAddress, COM_CATEGORY comCateGory, COM_NOTICE comNotice, COM_NOTICE_IMG comNoticeImg, MIN_PRICE minPrice, DELIVERYPAY deliverypay, FREEDELIVERY freeDelivery, BUSINESSTIME businesstime, DELIVERYZONE deliveryZone, APPDATE appDate, COM_PHONE comPhone from company where COM_ID = #{comId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANY SET DELIVERYPAY = #{deliverypay}, BUSINESSTIME = #{businesstime}, COM_PHONE = #{comPhone} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_NOTICE = #{comNotice}, COM_NOTICE_IMG = #{comNoticeImg} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_NOTICE = #{comNotice}, COM_NOTICE_IMG = #{comNoticeImg} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_PHONE = #{comPhone} where COM_ID = #{comId}
mapper.select: select ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId , ORDERSTATE orderState , TOTALPRICE totalPrice from ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} ORDER BY ORDERDATE ASC

select ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId , ORDERSTATE orderState , TOTALPRICE totalPrice from ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND ORDERSTATE = '배달완료' ORDER BY ORDERDATE ASC

select ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId , ORDERSTATE orderState , TOTALPRICE totalPrice from ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND ORDER_RESULT = '주문거절'ORDER BY ORDERDATE ASC

SELECT ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId , ORDERSTATE orderState , TOTALPRICE totalPrice FROM ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND ORDERDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY ORDERDATE ASC

SELECT ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, METHODSPAYMENT methodsPayment, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, ORDER_ADDRESS orderAddress, ORDER_REQUEST orderRequest, ORDERSITUATION orderSituation, INSTALMENT instalment, COUPON coupon, ORDERSTATE orderState, MEM_ID memId, TOTALPRICE totalPrice FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}
SELECT M.MENU_NAME menuName, M.MENU_PRICE menuPrice , C.MENU_COUNT menuCount FROM MENU M INNER JOIN CART C ON M.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REVIEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REVIEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} AND TO_DATE(R.REVIEW_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REVIEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} and R.CEOREPLIES is null ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
